original_text: For his merciful kindness is great toward us: and the truth of the Lord endureth for ever. Praise ye the Lord.
korean_text: 우리에게 향하신 여호와의 인자하심이 크시고 여호와의 진실하심이 영원함이로다 할렐루야

sentences.original_text: For his merciful kindness is great toward us:
and the truth of the Lord endureth for ever.
